metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to elevating devices in buildings within the scope of Part 9
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to elevating devices in buildings within the scope of Part 9

requirements.description: Elevating devices shall conform to CSA B44, Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators
requirements.exact_quote: Elevating devices shall conform to CSA B44, Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators

requirements.description: Platform lifts shall conform to CSA B355, Lifts for Persons with Physical Disabilities
requirements.exact_quote: Platform lifts shall conform to CSA B355, Lifts for Persons with Physical Disabilities

requirements.description: Elevators are not required in buildings within the scope of Part 9
requirements.exact_quote: Elevators are not required in buildings within the scope of Part 9

requirements.description: Platform lifts shall be installed in accordance with CSA B355
requirements.exact_quote: Platform lifts shall be installed in accordance with CSA B355

requirements.description: Maximum vertical travel for platform lifts in Part 9 buildings
requirements.exact_quote: Platform lifts in Part 9 buildings shall have a maximum vertical travel of 3000 mm

requirements.description: Platform lifts travelling more than 2500 mm shall be enclosed with fire-rated construction
requirements.exact_quote: Platform lifts travelling more than 2500 mm shall be enclosed with fire-rated construction

requirements.description: Minimum fire-resistance rating for platform lift enclosures
requirements.exact_quote: Platform lift enclosures shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 minutes

requirements.description: Stairway chairlifts shall conform to CSA B355
requirements.exact_quote: Stairway chairlifts shall conform to CSA B355

requirements.description: Minimum clear stair width when chairlift is parked
requirements.exact_quote: When a stairway chairlift is parked, the clear stair width shall be not less than 860 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clear passage width when chairlift is in operation
requirements.exact_quote: When a stairway chairlift is in operation, the clear passage width shall be not less than 610 mm

requirements.description: Dumbwaiters shall conform to CSA B44
requirements.exact_quote: Dumbwaiters shall conform to CSA B44

requirements.description: Maximum floor area for dumbwaiter car
requirements.exact_quote: The floor area of a dumbwaiter car shall not exceed 0.836 m2

requirements.description: Maximum height of dumbwaiter car interior
requirements.exact_quote: The height of a dumbwaiter car interior shall not exceed 1200 mm

requirements.description: Dumbwaiter hoistways shall be enclosed with fire-rated construction where serving more than 2 storeys
requirements.exact_quote: Dumbwaiter hoistways shall be enclosed with fire-rated construction where serving more than 2 storeys
